summary: PURCHASED 2 MOTORBIKES (AMSTAR) DEALER ASSEMBLED THESE BIKES (ONE BIKE HAD THE STEERING BOLT COME OUT DURING THE RIDE AND THE BOTH BIKE HAD ELECTRICAL/CHARGING ISSUE. BOTH BIKES HAD SAME ISSUE (MFG ELECTRICAL TO THE LIGHT DRAW MORE THAN THE BIKE CAN CHARGE THUS DRAINING THE BATTERY, REPLACEMENT LED LAMPS CORRECTED THIS). ASSEMBLER FORGO TO PLACE CHAIN COVERS PER ORIGINAL DESIGN AND POST ASSEMBLY WORKMAN SHIP NOT SAFE FOR PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION PURCHASED FROM THE INDIVIDUAL BUSINEESS.
